TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable MalformedLineException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 當 方法無法使用指定的格式剖析資料列時擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the method cannot parse a row using the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢查以確定`TextFieldType`和`Delimiter`參數已適當地定義。Check to ensure that the `TextFieldType` and `Delimiter` parameters are defined properly. 如果方法無法剖析資料列使用指定的格式，擲回例外狀況。If the method cannot parse a row using the specified format, the exception is thrown. 包含錯誤行號的例外狀況。The exception contains the line number of the malformed line.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 繼承自類別。 inherits from the class. 這個建構函式設定的屬性物件下表所示。This constructor sets the properties of the object as shown in the following table. |屬性Property|值Value| |-|-| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| ||`message`字串。The `message` string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，則會在處理內部例外的 catch 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值如果傳遞到建構函式，則為 null 參考屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |-|-| ||`innerException`參考。The `innerException` reference.| ||`message`字串。The `message` string.|

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToString ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前例外狀況的字串表示。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the current exception.

returns.span: 目前例外狀況的字串表示。

span.span: A string representation of the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回表示目前例外狀況，為了能讓人瞭解。 returns a representation of the current exception that is intended to be understood by humans. 其中區分文化特性的資料包含的例外狀況，所傳回的字串表示無須考慮目前的系統文化特性。Where the exception contains culture-sensitive data, the string representation returned by is required to take into account the current system culture. 雖然傳回之字串的格式沒有實際上的需求，但它應該嘗試反映使用者了解物件的值。Although there are no exact requirements for the format of the returned string, it should attempt to reflect the value of the object as perceived by the user. 預設實作會擲回目前例外狀況、 訊息、 呼叫類別的名稱取得內部例外狀況的呼叫結果上，和錯誤行號如果任何這些成員為 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，其值不包含在傳回的字串。The default implementation of obtains the name of the class that threw the current exception, the message, the result of calling on the inner exception, the result of calling , and the line number of the malformed line If any of these members is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), its value is not included in the returned string. 如果沒有任何錯誤訊息，或者它是空字串 ("")，則會不傳回任何錯誤訊息。If there is no error message or if it is an empty string (""), then no error message is returned. 如果它們不是 null 參考，會傳回內部例外狀況和堆疊追蹤的名稱 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The name of the inner exception and the stack trace are returned only if they are not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides .
